lead_paragraph: A concern is that the rules would permit key foreign technologies to leak to Chinese competitors who are seeking to build a technology industry on a par with the West.
snippet: A concern is that the rules would permit key foreign technologies to leak to Chinese competitors who are seeking to build a technology industry on a par with the West.

headline.main: Chinese Rules Said to Threaten Proprietary Information
headline.seo: Chinese Rules Said to Threaten Proprietary Information
headline.print_headline: U.S. Companies Say Chinese Procurement Rules Threaten Proprietary Information
